page.title: 09HOBY CHURCH
page.content: Hoby church is a C.of E. church called All Saints.Hoby church is very old.It has been struck by lightning but has been put back together again.The church has three altars.It has a very pretty font as well.Hoby church has a tower and a spire.Hoby church has one gargoyle that we know of.Yew trees grow in the churchyard.Flowers and holly make it look pretty too.Inside are an eagle lectern and a memorial brass.There is also a seat in the wall which is called sedilia.The organ is at the back of the church with the font.The church has stain glass windows.Hoby church is in the middle of the village.
